summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3476, for the improvement of 61st Avenue Southwest, from Beach Drive to West Spokane Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43149 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
